Key Match Events: Towns fired up the home crowd by slamming home two one-handed dunks in the second quarter
Towns scored 27 points in the first half as New York built a 66-47 lead at halftime
New York led by as many as 30 points after starting the fourth quarter on a 22-11 run
Pre-Game Insights: Milwaukee had no answer for Towns and the new-look Knicks
Milwaukee hadn't had a losing record since the 2015-16 season
Post-Match Reflections: The Knicks snapped a two-game losing streak with a 116-94 win over the Milwaukee Bucks
Miscellaneous Highlights: Giannis Antetokounmpo had 24 points and 12 rebounds
Milwaukee (2-7) lost for the seventh time in eight games
Others: Six different Knicks scored in double figures
Josh Hart had 11 points, nine rebounds and seven assists
Jalen Brunson chipped in 15 points and nine assists
